ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with comicbox 1.1.1 on 2024-03-13T21:49:45 [Issue ID 4000-778244] urn:comicvine:4000-778244 Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-18 04:41:55. [Issue ID 2126081]
ComicInfo.Summary: Death Metal: An Anti-Crisis - Part II - Be the Fern: Wonder Woman, Wally West, and Swamp Thing take the first steps in Wonder Woman's plan to restore the Multiverse, but first she must convince Batman to join them. Meanwhile, Batmage, B. Rex, Batman Beyond, and several other-worldly Alfreds try to revive The Batman Who Laughs, who was killed by Wonder Woman, by transferring his brain into the body of a blue Bruce Wayne with unlimited energy, creating a powerful Bat-Manhattan Who Laughs.
